page.title: 13Occupations
page.content: Although apparently a rural village,only a minority of the residents make their living locally. Of the villagers and those on the farms in the area,5 are farm owners and about 13 farm workers.About 18 profesional,13 managerial & 5 clerical workers live in the area but nearly all go at least as far as Haddington to work.Only a few drive as far as Edinburgh everyday.It is not possible to go to work by public transport. There are 18 retired householders, half of whom held professional posts There are about 38 housewives, some of whom have part time jobs and some have retired with their husbands. Recently a number of younger families have come to live in the village and the children go in the school buses to Yester Primary and Haddington Secondary .
